name: Parisian Hot Chocolate
description: This drinking chocolate is rich and intense—serve it in a tiny espresso cup to avoid overdose.

recipeInstructions.text: In medium saucepan, stir cocoa with sugar and salt. Stir in milk, milk chocolate, and bittersweet chocolate.

Heat over medium heat until, stirring constantly, until chocolate is melted and mixture is hot. Gently whisk to completely homogenize mixture. Avoid allowing mixture to come to boil. Serve immediately.
